A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Pros: visually great. Great CGI sets etc\, what you would expect from a big budget star wars film. Good space battles and action scenes Cons: Story was awful. You could take Finns arc out and the movie would be the same. Absolutely ruined Luke's story. Walked out feeling like I watched an episode of Lost but set in space. So many plot holes\, no character development\, no questions answered from episode 7. Edit: the more I think about it\, the angrier I get. Anger leads to more hate. Do not understand where this is going anymore besides downhill.
